pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Sunday, April 18, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

2:00 p.m.  A video message from the Prime Minister will air during the Nova Scotia Remembers Memorial Ceremony, commemorating the first anniversary of the Nova Scotia shooting.

The event will be streamed live on CBC Nova Scotia’s website and Facebook page, on CBC Gem, and on CBC Radio One and CBC Listen.
